page.title: 12JOBS
page.content: Many years ago old records show there were more jobs on farms, the railway and for servants in big houses.Farmers and housewives have machines now and the railway closed.Our mothers and fathers work in{forestry,farming,shops {hotels,schools,}and as{drivers,police or{plumbers}and{engineers. "My Dad is an{Ambulance driver,}he works shifts taking people to hospital for appointments or from accidents." "My mum works at a big hotel{cleaning the bedrooms.On her days off she irons and cleans for an old lady." "My Dad is a{science teacher.}He gets up early to drive 30 miles He does experiments with the children." "My Dad is an{assistant editor}for the local paper. He reports on court cases council meetings and other events." "My dad{drives wagons.}He takes logs to sell in Hexham and other places."
